structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.text: No operator of a vehicle, after having received a visual or audible signal from an officer directing traffic shall knowingly or wantonly disregard the signal so as to interfere with or endanger the operation of the traffic officer or other vehicles or pedestrians.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 160, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 1
